METATRADER.DESC: Take your CFD trading experience to the next level.
METATRADER.H2: Trade on an exceptional platform available on iOS and Android.
METATRADER.DESC_H2: Experience fast, stable, and secure trading through our popular platform. Compatible with all devices, ensuring you never miss an opportunity in the financial markets!
METATRADER.CARD_DESC_1: Execute trades at millisecond speed with precise automated order matching, minimizing slippage and eliminating requotes—ensuring efficient trading even during market volatility.
METATRADER.CARD_DESC_2: Access real-time market data with over 38 technical indicators, quantitative analysis tools, and trend analysis systems—enabling precise trading plans backed by insightful decision-making support.
METATRADER.CARD_DESC_3: Supports trading across multiple asset classes—including Forex, stocks, commodities, and indices—enabling traders to easily diversify portfolios and employ varied trading strategies within a single platform.
METATRADER.CARD_DESC_4: Trade confidently on a platform with international security standards. All orders are executed transparently without broker intervention, with full transaction history available—ensuring market fairness.
METATRADER.TRADEMOBILE_TITLE: MetaTrader 5 Mobile Easy, secure trading anytime, anywhere.
METATRADER.TRADEMOBILE_DESC_1: MetaTrader 5 Mobile is designed to give you market access wherever you go. With its user-friendly interface, it offers comprehensive technical analysis tools, trading signals, and real-time price alerts to help you make precise trading decisions.
METATRADER.TRADEMOBILE_DESC_2: Through MetaTrader 5’s trading signals and copy trading functions, traders can follow and replicate successful strategies and trades. Orders are automatically copied to your account, enabling effortless trading.
METATRADER.TOOL_MT5_TITLE: Financial instruments you can trade on MT5.
METATRADER.TOOL_MT5_DESC: At GOC, you can trade CFDs on over 200 financial instruments, including Forex currency pairs, metals, cryptocurrencies, stocks, indices, and energies.
METATRADER.SYMBOL_DESC_1: Trade over 100 currency pairs via CFDs on MT5, including major pairs like EUR/USD, GBP/USD, USD/JPY, as well as exotic pairs offering additional investment opportunities.
METATRADER.SYMBOL_DESC_2: Access leading precious metals markets, including Gold (XAU/USD), Silver (XAG/USD), and other industrial metals.
METATRADER.SYMBOL_DESC_3: Trade the energy markets with CFDs on Crude Oil (UKOIL, USOIL) and Natural Gas (XNG/USD), enabling strategies based on global energy market movements.
METATRADER.SYMBOL_DESC_4: Trade top global stocks like Apple, Tesla, and Amazon via CFDs without owning the underlying assets.
METATRADER.SYMBOL_DESC_5: Diversify your portfolio with CFDs on major global indices, including Dow Jones (DJI), NASDAQ, and NASDAQ, to capitalize on global market movements.
METATRADER.SYMBOL_DESC_6: Trade popular cryptocurrencies on MetaTrader 5 via CFDs, including Bitcoin (BTC/USD), Ethereum (ETH/USD), Litecoin (LTC/USD), and more.
METATRADER.WHYGOC_DESC: Superior trading conditions, advanced security, transparency, and dedicated customer support—these are the reasons traders continue to choose GOC.
METATRADER.CARD_DESC_GOC_1: Take control of your funds with instant withdrawals—fast, secure, and hassle-free.
METATRADER.CARD_DESC_GOC_2: Stay ahead of trends with rapid execution. Execute your trades swiftly and stay ahead of the market on every move. Available exclusively at GOC.
METATRADER.CARD_DESC_GOC_3: Benefit from our unique Stop Out protection feature—delaying or even avoiding automatic order closure when trading with GOC.

ABOUT.H1:
Get to know the broker
GOC Prime
ABOUT.DESC: Trade with Confidence Go Beyond Your Goal Experience seamless and uninterrupted trading with security and transparency in every transaction. We are committed to creating l imitless trading opportunities on a professional and trustworthy platform, supporting every investment style with modern and intelligent technology. GOC Prime.
ABOUT.H2_S1_DESC: We are committed to becoming the largest trading platform in the world, driven by advanced technology that is stable and user-friendly, elevating the trading experience with superior market conditions. We aim to be an organization that grows and moves forward, expanding opportunities and pushing the limits of trading to ensure that traders, investors, and partners succeed together.
ABOUT.H2_S2_DESC: Reliability is at the heart of GOC Prime. We are committed to maintaining the highest standards of integrity, transparency, and responsibility. Our trading system is designed to be secure, reliable, and efficiently manage risks to protect our clients' funds. We strictly adhere to legal requirements and continuously develop with innovative solutions, backed by a team of experts and a strong track record. GOC Prime is a trusted partner in the trading world.
ABOUT.H2_S3_TITLE: GOC Prime helps traders surpass their limits with fair conditions, advanced technology, and high liquidity.
ABOUT.H2_S4_DESC: GOC Prime is committed to a strong and sustainable business, focused on driving the success of investors while setting new standards in the financial industry!
ABOUT.CARD_DESC_1: GOC Prime opens a borderless trading world with diverse assets and advanced platforms, empowering you to access markets and shape your future with confidence!
ABOUT.CARD_TITLE_2: Protect your investments, boost your confidence.
ABOUT.CARD_DESC_2: GOC Prime is committed to the highest security with international-standard protection measures, ensuring every trade is stable and worry-free.
ABOUT.CARD_DESC_3: GOC Prime develops cutting-edge trading solutions, providing an elevated investment experience while adapting to every market change!
ABOUT.CARD_DESC_4: With transparency and verifiability, we are a trusted broker that customers rely on.

HEADER.TITLE: Trading Account
HEADER.DESCRIPTION: The GOC Prime trading account offers Free Swap on all account types, providing you with multiple pathways to the f inancial markets and exclusive benefits to enhance your trading experience.

QUESTIONS.NIGHT_TRADE_LOT_LIMIT: Trading during economic news, is there a reduction in leverage?

ANSWERS.NIGHT_TRADE_LOT_LIMIT: There is no reduction in leverage during such periods.

CALENDAR.TITLE: GOC Economic Calendar
CALENDAR.DESCRIPTION: Stay updated on economic news impacting global financial markets with GOC’s real-time economic calendar. Get important updates on economic data releases, major financial events, and market trends that may affect your investments.

SECTION_3.TITLE: Plan your trading with the GOC Economic Calendar
SECTION_3.DESCRIPTION: GOC’s Economic Calendar provides crucial information on global economic events that may impact the Forex, stock, commodity, and cryptocurrency markets. With real-time updates and in-depth insights, you can analyze market trends, strategize, and adapt to financial situations.
SECTION_3.SUBTITLE: Stay updated with real-time financial market news.
SECTION_3.FOOTER: Key News Types in the Forex Market:
SECTION_3.NEWS_TYPE_1_ITEM_1: GDP (Gross Domestic Product): Measures economic growth.
SECTION_3.NEWS_TYPE_1_ITEM_2: Employment Data (NFP, Unemployment Rate): Indicates the health of the labor market.
SECTION_3.NEWS_TYPE_1_ITEM_3: Interest Rate Decisions: Announced by central banks, affecting monetary policy.
SECTION_3.NEWS_TYPE_1_ITEM_4: Inflation (CPI, PPI): Reflects cost of living trends and interest rate adjustments.
SECTION_3.NEWS_TYPE_2_ITEM_1: Meeting reports from the Fed (USA), ECB (Europe), BOE (UK), BOJ (Japan).
SECTION_3.NEWS_TYPE_2_ITEM_2: Forecasts and interest rate trends affect the money market and currency values.
SECTION_3.NEWS_TYPE_3_ITEM_1: Leaders' statements on economic stimulus and tax cuts.
SECTION_3.NEWS_TYPE_3_ITEM_2: Budget plans and monetary policies that impact currency values and exchange rates.
SECTION_3.NEWS_TYPE_4_ITEM_1: Wars, trade conflicts, sanctions, or significant events affecting markets.

STOP_OUT_PROTECTION.TITLE: Stop Out Protection
STOP_OUT_PROTECTION.DESCRIPTION: Benefit from our unique Stop Out protection feature—delaying or even avoiding automatic order closure when trading with GOC.

BENEFITS.TITLE: Benefits of the Economic Calendar
BENEFITS.DESCRIPTION_1: The economic calendar focuses on key economic and political events both domestically and internationally, which could significantly impact the price movements of trading instruments.
BENEFITS.DESCRIPTION_2: This investment calendar will be automatically updated to ensure traders receive the latest news on upcoming events that may affect their trades.
